output_dir.description: Directory where processed data will be saved.

adjust_longitude.description: Whether to adjust longitude values to the range [-180, 180].

adjust_longitude_vname.description: Variable name of the longitude values to adjust.

adjust_longitude_fname.description: Suffix of file names after adjusting longitude values.

convert_kelvin_to_celsius.description: Whether to convert temperature values from Kelvin to Celsius.

convert_kelvin_to_celsius_vname.description: Variable name of the temperature values to convert.

convert_kelvin_to_celsius_fname.description: Suffix of file names after converting temperature values to Celsius.

convert_m_to_mm_precipitation.description: Whether to convert precipitation values from meters to millimeters.

convert_m_to_mm_precipitation_vname.description: Variable name of the precipitation values to convert.

convert_m_to_mm_precipitation_fname.description: Suffix of file names after converting precipitation values to millimeters.

resample_grid.description: Whether to resample the grid to a specified resolution.

resample_grid_vname.description: Variable names of the latitude and longitude values for resampling.

resample_degree.description: Value of the target grid resolution.

resample_grid_fname.description: Suffix of file names after resampling the grid.

downsample_agg_funcs.description: Aggregation function for each variable during downsampling.

upsample_method_map.description: Mapping method for each variable during upsampling.

downsample_max_lon_xarray.description: Expected maximum longitude value after downsampling with xarray to match population data.

downsample_lib.description: Library to use for downsampling. Options are 'xarray', 'xesmf', or 'cdo'.

downsample_new_min_lat.description: Minimum latitude of the new grid. Used for xesmf and cdo downsampling.

downsample_new_max_lat.description: Maximum latitude of the new grid. Used for xesmf downsampling.

downsample_new_min_lon.description: Minimum longitude of the new grid. Used for xesmf and cdo downsampling.

downsample_new_max_lon.description: Maximum longitude of the new grid. Used for xesmf downsampling.

downsample_new_lat_size.description: Number of latitude points in the new grid. Used for cdo downsampling.

downsample_new_lon_size.description: Number of longitude points in the new grid. Used for cdo downsampling.

downsample_gridtype.description: Type of the grid for downsampling with cdo. Options are 'gaussian', 'lonlat', 'curvilinear', or 'unstructured'.

truncate_date.description: Whether to truncate the time series from a specified date.

truncate_date_from.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD to truncate the time series from.

truncate_date_to.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD to truncate the time series to.

truncate_date_vname.description: Variable name of the time values to truncate.

unify_coords.description: Whether to unify coordinate names in the data file.

unify_coords_fname.description: Suffix of file names after unifying coordinate names.

uni_coords.description: Mapping of variable names to their new names.

cal_monthly_tp.description: Whether to calculate monthly total precipitation based on data downloaded from ERA5-Land monthly data. The real precipitation of the month = downloaded value * number of days in the month.

cal_monthly_tp_vname.description: Variable name of the precipitation values to calculate monthly total precipitation.

cal_monthly_tp_tcoord.description: Time coordinate name of the precipitation variable.

cal_monthly_tp_fname.description: Suffix of file names after calculating monthly total precipitation.
